name: Dayoung
description:
Test your skills in rafting in this sports rafting game and help the Indonesian rafting team win their independence day contest!

Dayoung is a sport rafting game by Dua Pulau Studio. Master all 3 levels and get the gold medals to win the contest!

Features
  • Try your best on 3 action-packed levels
  • Master the rivers and the waves that will complicate your winnings
  • Collect flags and pass slaloms to get the gold medals in each level
How To Play
  • Use 'Q' or 'P' to paddle left or right while moving forwards
  • Use 'S' or 'L' to steer left or right while staying still
  • Press "Space" to paddle backward
  • Collect flags and pass slaloms to win each level before the time runs out!
Credits
  • Muhammad Multazam - Game Designer
  • Josiah Ken Aprillio (Myself) - Programming
  • Lazuardi Pratama Putra - 3D Modeller
  • Mochammad Fikry Ardiansyah - 2D Concept Artist
  • Muhammad Miftah Pratama - Level Designer
  • Amanda Divia Ardianti - UI Design
  • Fadhel Suryakusuma - Sound Designer & Music Director

This game was created in part of our 5th-semester Practice Class
